pasugiyada ema margaye yathurupadiyakin gaman kala tharunayan dedeneku, dumriye hapi miyagos thibe.wadduwe mewani dumriya haras marga gananawakama, magi aarakshaka gettu sawikota nomathi dumriya haras margawala mewani jiwitha anathuru gananawakma me dakwa siduwi athayi pradeshawasihu pawasathi.wadduwa dampegama pare sita samudraramaya wethata diwena margaye hamuwana dumriya haras margaya, (wisheshayen irida polata gaman karana paribhogika janathawa wishala sankhyawakma eha meha gaman karana) mewani thawath anarakshitha maru kapollaki.werala pare sita upali mawatha wethata diwena margayath, pasal lamayin wenath minisun wishala washayen nithara gaman karana, mewanima anarakshitha margayak wana athara me sthanayeda aarakshitha gettuwak sawikota nomatha.palliyamankada handiye sita upali mawathata watena dumriya haras margaye aarakshitha gettuwak sawikota nomatha.me anarakshitha dumriya haras margawala una bambu gettu sawikota, maginge jiwitha raka dena lesa wadduwa janathawa dumriya departhamenthuwe wagakiwayuthu niladharingen illa sitithi..

ohu wisin siya sanasima udakaraganu pinisa thoraganu labuye, rastaferiyan dahamayi.
